main.name: Vishvesh Modcoicar
main.description: I love to build and create things that make people's lives easier.
main.bio: Hey there! I'm Vishvesh — data whisperer by day, podcast host by passion, and a full-stack hustler in between. With hands-on experience in AI, data science, and cybersecurity, I've worked with startups, corporates, and even pitched defense strategies to ₹400 Cr+ firms. Along this wild ride, I discovered that my real spark lies in translating complex tech into real-world impact — whether that's through building dashboards, hosting high-energy podcast episodes, or mentoring fellow learners. I've educated, entertained, and empowered audiences through data-driven storytelling — from YouTube to boardrooms. Here, you'll get a front-row seat to real projects, real conversations, and real wins — all from someone who's learning, growing, and hacking the system every day, just like you.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me soon for new projects, collaborations, or just a friendly chat! I'm always open to new opportunities and ideas.

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree, Computer Science Engineering (With AI & Data Science Specialization)
education.description: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science Engineering with a specialization in AI and Data Science from MIT-WPU, Pune. I am actively involved in various projects and research activities related to AI and data science.

work.title: Data Science Intern
work.description: Web-scraped 3,800+ customer reviews to analyze passenger sentiment and operational feedback. Extracted actionable insights using Python, NLP, and RStudio, contributing to improved visualization and data storytelling pipelines for customer experience analysis.

work.title: Director
work.description: Led R&D initiatives and streamlined cross-functional collaboration between marketing, design, and technical teams. Boosted data analytics efficiency by 70% through workshops and automation tools focused on beginner-friendly onboarding.

work.company: Computer Society of India (CSI) – MIT-WPU Chapter
work.title: PR & Content Head
work.description: Managed PR, outreach, and content across club verticals. Spearheaded major tech events and led SaaS and data science initiatives, enhancing member engagement and cross-domain collaboration.

work.title: Cybersecurity Associate
work.description: Delivered cybersecurity training to mid-sized enterprises, including Supreme Facility Management (₹300–400 Cr turnover). Built and proposed cybersecurity frameworks tailored to client infrastructure and digital workflows.

work.title: Management Head
work.description: Scaled GDSC from 20 to 900+ active members, establishing it as the leading chapter in Pune. Collaborated on Google Summer of Code projects including a Hidden Camera Detector with OpenCV, and mentored peers on product research and community engagement.

work.title: Head of Hosts & Podcasts
work.description: Led a 70-member media team and managed a community of 300+ students. Hosted high-profile college-funded podcast episodes featuring guests like UPSC interviewer Dr. Vijender Singh Chauhan. Oversaw content, production, and guest relations.

work.title: Podcast & Event Host (Independent Contractor)
work.description: Weekend freelance host for shows and podcasts, contributing to rent and living expenses. Managed end-to-end production, audience engagement, and earned consistent feedback for lively, insightful sessions blending tech, entrepreneurship, and storytelling.

testimonials.text: Vishvesh is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
You'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
